title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: The label's font size does not change immediately when it is modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.
EB: When the font size of a label is changed, the height of the label should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
